title: ŠAMPON PROTI PRHLJAJU SENSITIVE ACTION, RECEPT, SUBRINA, 400ML

product-info.opis: Šampon proti prhljaju Subrina Recept Sensitive Action  vsebuje aktivni sestavini octopirox, ki preprečuje nastanek trdovratnega prhljaja in odstranjuje prhljaj,...

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Lauryl Glucoside, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Coco Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium, Sorbate, Tocopherol, Parfum, Laureth 2, Sodium Citrate, Propylene Glycol, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Piroctone Olamine, Polyquaternium-10, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer.
